name: ORG_SURGICAL_INFO2
description: Contains organ and surgical level information related to transplant.

columns.name: ORG_RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the organ record.

columns.name: STERNOTOMY_APPRCH_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicate whether the sternotomy performed was routine or a reoperation related to lung transplant surgery

columns.name: PFO_IDENTIFIED_YN
columns.description: Indicate whether a patent foramen ovale (PFO) was identified during heart transplant surgery.

columns.name: CHEST_CLOSED_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the sternum/chest cavity was closed or left open after the cardiothoracic transplant surgery.

columns.name: RETURN_TO_CPB_YN
columns.description: Indicate whether the patient returned to cardiopulmonary bypass after the cardiothoracic transplant surgery.

columns.name: CHEST_OPEN_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the reason why the transplant recipient's chest was left open after the transplant surgery.

columns.name: ORGAN_DAMAGE_YN
columns.description: Indicate whether there was any damage to the donor organ.

columns.name: ORGAN_DAMAGE_SPEC
columns.description: Indicates the damage to the donor organ.

columns.name: PLAQUE_DNR_AORTA_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the plaque present on the donor's aorta.

columns.name: PLAQUE_DNR_RENART_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the plaque present on the donor's renal artery.

columns.name: ATHERO_RECIP_RENA_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the type of atherosclerosis present on the recipient's renal artery.

columns.name: ATHERO_RECIP_AORT_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the type of atherosclerosis present on the recipient's aorta.

columns.name: RECIP_ARTERIAL_OTH
columns.description: Indicates the other arterial site for the transplant recipient.

columns.name: INCISION_SITE_OTH
columns.description: Indicates the other surgical incision site for the transplant recipient.

columns.name: DONOR_PAO2_MAX_NUM
columns.description: Indicate the maximum value for the donor's oxygen saturation (PaO2) in mmHg.

columns.name: DONOR_PRESSURE_CLOS
columns.description: Indicate the donor's airway pressure in cm H2O when the donor's chest is closed

columns.name: DONOR_PRESSURE_OPEN
columns.description: Indicate the donor's airway pressure in cm H2O when the donor's chest is open.

columns.name: SURGICAL_POSITION_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicate the surgical position of the recipient.

columns.name: EX_VIVO_PERFUSION_YN
columns.description: Indicate whether ex-vivo perfusion was performed.

columns.name: INCISION_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicate the surgical incision type used on the recipient.

columns.name: ANTERIOR_PERICARD_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether an anterior pericardiotomy procedure was performed during the lung transplant surgery.

columns.name: PLEURAL_ADHESIONS_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicate whether any pleural adhesions were found during the lung transplant surgery.

columns.name: ADHESION_SITE_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates on which lung the pleural adhesions were found.

columns.name: LUNG_IMPLANT_METH_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicate the method of pneumonectomy and implant used during the lung transplant surgery.

columns.name: LUNG_IMPLANT_ORDER_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the order of the pneumonectomy and implant for en-bloc or bilateral sequential lung transplant surgery: Left then right, or right then left.

columns.name: BRONCH_ANAS_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the technique used for bronchial anastomosis during the lung transplant surgery.

columns.name: DIAPH_PLICATION_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicate whether a diaphragm plication was performed, with or without sutures, during the lung transplant surgery.

columns.name: COMPLETION_BRONCH_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the findings of a fiberoptic bronchoscopy procedure that was performed during the lung transplant.

columns.name: CPB_TIME_NUM
columns.description: Indicate the number of minutes the patient was on cardiopulmonary bypass for circulatory support during the surgery.

columns.name: FIO2_NUM
columns.description: Indicate the percent oxygen measured post-lung transplant, entered as a decimal between 0 and 1.

columns.name: PA_PRESSURE_OPEN
columns.description: Indicates the recipient's pulmonary artery pressure in mmHg when the recipient's chest is open after the lung transplant surgery.

columns.name: PA_PRESSURE_CLOS
columns.description: Indicates the recipient's pulmonary artery pressure in mmHg when the recipient's chest is closed after the lung transplant surgery.

columns.name: CLOSURE_TECHNIQUE_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicate the technique used to close the recipient's body after the transplant surgery.

columns.name: LUNG_DRAIN_SITE_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the drainage site for excess fluids during the lung transplant surgery.

columns.name: HEMOSTASIS_QUAL_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicate the quality of the recipient's blood clotting after the transplant surgery.

columns.name: DNR_CXR_HORIZ_NUM
columns.description: Indicate the measurement across the donor's chest prior to the lung transplant.

columns.name: DNR_CXR_L_VERT_NUM
columns.description: Indicate the measurement across the left vertical portion of the donor's chest prior to the lung transplant.

columns.name: DNR_CXR_R_VERT_NUM
columns.description: Indicate the measurement across the right vertical portion of the donor's chest prior to the lung transplant.

columns.name: VASCULAR_ACCESS_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the site of vascular access for the transplant, as separate from anastomosis sites.

columns.name: HEPATECTOMY_ST_TM_DTTM
columns.description: Indicate the hepatectomy start time.

columns.name: VENOUS_RECON_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the venous reconstruction technique used during the surgery.
entries: Insertion of donor iliac vein extension graft

columns.name: VENOUS_RECON_OTHER
columns.description: Indicates the other venous site type for the recipient.

columns.name: RECIP_AORTIC_TM_DTTM
columns.description: Indicate the clamp on time of the recipient's aorta

columns.name: PROX_BOWEL_NAT_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicate where the donor organ was connected in the donor's body for the intestinal transplant surgery.

columns.name: PROX_BOWEL_TXP_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicate where the donor organ was connected in the recipient's body during the intestinal transplant surgery.

columns.name: DIST_BOWEL_NAT_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicate where the donor organ was connected in the donor's body during the intestinal transplant surgery.

columns.name: DIST_BOWEL_TXP_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicate where the donor organ was connected in the recipient's body for the intestinal transplant surgery.

columns.name: PERISTALSIS_IN_OR_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether there was peristalsis in the operating room during the transplant surgery.

columns.name: PERF_SUPPORT_OTHER
columns.description: Indicates the other type of perfusion support used on the recipient during the surgery.

columns.name: DEVICE_EXPLANT_OTH
columns.description: Indicates other device explanted.

columns.name: PREOP_MCS_OTH
columns.description: Indicates the other pre-op mechanical circulatory support devices in the transplant recipient.

columns.name: POSTOP_MCS_OTH
columns.description: Indicates the other post-op mechanical circulatory support devices in the transplant recipient.

columns.name: TRACH_ANAS_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the technique used for tracheal anastomosis during the transplant surgery.

columns.name: ART_GRAFT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the type of arterial graft performed during the transplant surgery.

columns.name: BILE_DUCT_STENT_OTH
columns.description: Indicates the free text technique for the recipient's bile duct stent.

columns.name: ART_INFLOW_OTH
columns.description: Indicates the free text technique for the recipient's arterial inflow.

columns.name: SUTURE_BRAND_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the brand name of the suture used during the transplant surgery.

columns.name: SUTURE_SIZE_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the suture size in USP designation measurement used during the transplant surgery.

columns.name: NATV_PV_ANAST_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the native portal vein anastomosis type used during the transplant surgery.

columns.name: ART_RECON_SUTURE_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the type of arterial reconstruction suture technique used during the transplant surgery.

columns.name: DIST_ENTEROSTOMY_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the type of distal enterostomy performed during the transplant surgery.
entries: Left Colon to Side of Distal Graft

columns.name: ARTERIAL_TYP_OTHR
columns.description: Indicates the specific site of arterial vascular access used during the transplant surgery.

columns.name: VENOUS_TYP_OTHR
columns.description: Indicates the specific site of venous vascular access used during the transplant surgery.

columns.name: CHEST_OP_RSN_OTHR
columns.description: Indicates the specific reason why the transplant recipient's chest was left open after the transplant surgery.

columns.name: RSN_CPB_OTHR
columns.description: Indicates the specific reason why the patient needed to return to cardiopulmonary bypass support after the cardiothoracic transplant surgery.

columns.name: PROCURE_DAMAGE_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the organ was damaged during procurement.

columns.name: PROCURE_DAMAGE_CMT
columns.description: Indicates the specific damage to the organ during procurement.

columns.name: RECIP_SUP_VC_COMP_DTTM
columns.description: Indicates the superior vena cava completion time for the transplant recipient.

columns.name: RECIP_INF_VC_COMP_DTTM
columns.description: Indicates the inferior vena cava completion time for the transplant recipient.

columns.name: BILE_DUCT_COMP_DTTM
columns.description: Indicates the bile duct completion time for the transplant recipient.

columns.name: VC_BYPASS_ST_DTTM
columns.description: Indicates the vena cava bypass start time for the transplant recipient.

columns.name: VC_BYPASS_END_DTTM
columns.description: Indicates the vena cava bypass end time for the transplant recipient.

columns.name: PRESER_SOL_LOT_NUM
columns.description: Indicates the lot number of preservation solution for the donor organ.

columns.name: PRESER_SOL_EXP_DATE
columns.description: Indicates the expiration date of preservation solution for the donor organ.

columns.name: ORG_PERFUSION_LOCATION_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicate where the organ perfusion occurred.

columns.name: ORG_PERFUSION_BY_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicate who performed the organ perfusion.
